sentences.english: We should develop small towns on the Basis of existing county seats and of organic towns where conditions permit.
sentences.chinese: 发展小城镇要以现有的县城和有条件的建制镇为基础。

sentences.english: The town was quiet but remote, they felt very happ though.
sentences.chinese: 小城幽静而偏僻，他们感觉却很幸福。

sentences.english: Ultimately, it is good for healthy and orderly development of Bayannur's small towns.
sentences.chinese: 最终促进巴彦淖尔市小城镇健康有序的发展。

sentences.english: That small town is the last far-flung outpost of our country.
sentences.chinese: 那个小城镇是我们国家一个遥远的前哨基地。

sentences.english: Their destination is the gleaming Chinese town of Fuyuan, reached by whizzy hydrofoil.
sentences.chinese: 他们的目的地是美丽的中国小城抚远。

sentences.english: Two small cities and three tall trees.
Exploit the mineral resources of energy and realize the sustainable development.
sentences.chinese: 开发能源资源，实现资源型小城镇的可持续发展。

sentences.english: The same goes for small towns in other high-tax, high-regulatory states
sentences.chinese: 这在其他高税收多规则的州的小城镇，也是一样。

sentences.english: Feeding the regional economy of towns , are the ties of urban-rural integration.
sentences.chinese: 小城镇反哺区域经济，是城乡一体化的纽带。

sentences.english: He decided to come back to the small town because he could be a big man in this small town.
sentences.chinese: 他决定返回小城，因为他能成小城里的大人物。

sentences.english: Moreover, the key for future development will be small cities and towns.
sentences.chinese: 此外，未来发展的关键将在中小城镇。

sentences.english: You can see it along the country roads that connect these small towns and farmlands.
sentences.chinese: 你可以沿着连接这些小城镇和农田的乡村道路看到。

sentences.english: Living in a big city has several benefit.
sentences.chinese: 然而，生活在小城镇李也有好处。

sentences.english: The institutions of a small city-state could not cope with an empire.
sentences.chinese: 小城邦的制度无法应付一个帝国。

sentences.english: There are five hundred and fifty-five people living in that small town.
sentences.chinese: 在那个小城镇里住着555个人。

sentences.english: If I were young again, I would go out on the town.
sentences.chinese: 如果我能再年轻一回，我会走出这个小城。

definition: Dacheng county in Langfang 廊坊[Lang2 fang2], Hebei/Tacheng township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
Shancheng district of Hebi city 鶴壁市|鹤壁市[He4 bi4 shi4], Henan
